tool_description: Get the latitude and longitude for a given address.
name: Geocoding
title: Geocoding

api_list.name: /get_location_from_address
api_list.description: Given an address, get the latitude and longitude coordinate values. Pincode input is optional.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://geocoding16.p.rapidapi.com/get_location_from_address"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geocoding16.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://geocoding16.p.rapidapi.com/get_location_from_address"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geocoding16.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
